name: raml-path-selector
description: Element to select a path in the RAML resources structure. It displays RAML's API structure in the tree view and allow to select a node and signal path selected by the user
author: The Advanced REST client authors <arc@mulesoft.com>

scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/polymer lint raml-path-selector.html raml-structure-tree.html raml-resource-tree-item.html path-selector-resource.html path-selector-documentation.html path-selector-types.html raml-documentation-tree-item.html raml-type-tree-item.html raml-tree-item-behavior.html
